channel.title: Met Éireann Warnings
channel.description:
Warnings issued by Met Éireann. This RSS feed displays valid warnings for land areas only. Sea area warnings will be added at a later date. Clicking the links, loads the CAP (Common Alerting Protocol) XML file.
Note: Moderate means ‘Status Yellow’, Severe means ‘Status Orange’ and extreme means ‘Status Red’

item.title: Blight Advisory for Ireland
item.description: A potato blight advisory is in effect. For details please see the Farming Commentary under the Forecasts tab.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning for all coasts of Ireland
item.description: Northerly winds will reach force 6 or higher at times
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Roche's Point to Bloody Foreland to Carnsore Point
item.description: North to northwest winds will reach force 6 at times.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Malin Head to Strangford Lough to Carnsore Point
item.description: Northwest winds will occasionally reach force 6.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Hook Head to Mizen Head to Erris Head
item.description: Southerly winds will increase to force 6 or higher.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)
